otpMessage: Please input your One Time Password.
signupError: Failed to signup. Account with this email might exist already.
recoverPasswordText: Don't worry, happens to the best of us.
recoverPasswordSubmitText: If account exists, an email will be sent with further instructions.
changePasswordOTP: You just logged in with an one-time-password. Please change your password immediately.
alreadyHaveAccountText: Do you already have an account? Login.
forgotPasswordText: Forgot your password? No Problem! Reset it.
